featured.text: The establishment and features of a special theme park.
Its establishment was proposed by Langford.

definition.zh_def: 建立或設立的行為或過程，通常指機構、組織或法律的創立。
definition.en_def: The act or process of setting up or founding something, typically an institution, organization, or law.
definition.example: The establishment of the new school was celebrated by the community.
